name: Snovian.Space
description: Snovian.Space is a decentralized reward based social networking platform. Snovian.Space is designed specifically for professionals in crypto, tech, and other niches. Users can contact each other via messages, that the recipients read and answer, incentivized by a crypto reward for their time and expertise. Unlike platforms that sell your data, on Snovian.Space users are in full control of their own data. Users get paid for their valuable information and businesses receive interested contacts. Direct exchange of data is the future with Snovian.Space.
